duties_responsibilities.duty: Review complex tax accounts, tax planning and consulting for over two hundred complex accounts including individuals, corporations, partnerships, fiduciaries, estates and exempt organizations.
Oversee multiple personnel, including mentoring and coaching staff members.
Maintain, develop and expand client relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in accounting or a related field (Advance degree in taxation preferred). Required California Licensed CPA or the ability to become licensed in California within 6 months of joining the firm.
